title: Meta theme-color
body: Support Meta theme-color for filling the role msapplication-TileColor, bringing back the role of msapplication-navbutton-color (if those meta tags aren't present) and also setting the color of the status bar on Edge Mobile.

comments.body: Why can't we fix our colors of fonts that create a hardship when it comes to reading especially when one has cataracts. There is no setting for font colors, which I have tried finding some kind of setting. This makes your upgrading more like downgrading.
Chrome has support for this but **only* on Android version, not on Desktop ones
The tile and status bar may not always work as the same color, so maintaining both is probably still a good idea.
